co.lqnt.lockbox.key

Interface PublicKeyInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KeyInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PublicKey

    public interface PublicKeyInterface
extends KeyInterface
    The interface implemented by Lockbox public keys.
